title: Mindset Development for Scientific Growth: Strategies to Maximize Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and prior learning experience
context.additional_context: Goal to overcome post-pandemic learning barriers and enhance academic performance by fostering a growth mindset among adult learners in science fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve a 20% or higher improvement in scores on the Growth Mindset Scale (GMS) assessment at the end of the 4-week course.
Over 80% of learners report perceiving failure as a growth opportunity in self-assessment surveys during scientific problem-solving.
90% of learners propose improvement strategies using peer feedback in team-based scientific inquiry activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
